InstructionData.Title: house
InstructionData.Author: Anders142536
InstructionData.Instructions:
loop:
alias CentrifugeOpen r14 define BattDisplay HASH("LED Display (Large) Batt Charge")
#Battery LCD lb r10 HASH("StructureBattery") Ratio Average sbn HASH("StructureConsoleLED1x3") BattDisplay Setting r10 sbn HASH("StructureConsoleLED1x3") BattDisplay Mode 1 #Prozent #sb HASH("StructureBattery") On 1
#Growlight sbn HASH("StructureDaylightSensor") HASH("Daylight Sensor Base") Mode 1 lbn r10 HASH("StructureDaylightSensor") HASH("Daylight Sensor Base") Horizontal Average sbn HASH("StructureConsoleLED5") HASH("Debug1") Setting r10
move r1 0 ble r10 30 GrowLightEnd move r1 1 GrowLightEnd: sb HASH("StructureGrowLight") On r1
#Arc Furnace lbns r11 HASH("StructureArcFurnace") HASH("Arc Furnace") 0 Occupied Maximum sbn HASH("StructureArcFurnace") HASH("Arc Furnace") Activate r11
#Recycler lbns r11 HASH("StructureRecycler") HASH("Recycler Base") 0 Occupied Maximum sbn HASH("StructureRecycler") HASH("Recycler Base") On r11
#Centrifuges lb r0 HASH("StructureCentrifuge") Reagents Maximum sbn HASH("StructureConsoleLED5") HASH("Debug2") Setting r0
blt r0 200 CentrifugeLt200 move CentrifugeOpen 1 CentrifugeLt200: bgt r0 1 CentrifugeGt0 move CentrifugeOpen 0 CentrifugeGt0: sb HASH("StructureCentrifuge") Open CentrifugeOpen
sleep 2
j loop
